headline.main: No. 4 Gonzaga Recovers From 1st Loss, Routs Pacific 82-50
headline.print_headline: No. 4 Gonzaga Recovers From 1st Loss, Routs Pacific 82-50

lead_paragraph: The focus for a week was on Gonzaga's first loss of the season. Minutes after the Bulldogs bounced back with a convincing victory, coach Mark Few wanted the spotlight on another number.
snippet: The focus for a week was on Gonzaga's first loss of the season. Minutes after the Bulldogs bounced back with a convincing victory, coach Mark Few wanted the spotlight on another number....
